title: Three children killed after lorry ploughs into group of kids at school gates in horrific crash captured on CCTV
text:
Three children killed after lorry ploughs into group of kids at school gates in horrific crash captured on CCTV WARNING: DISTRESSING FOOTAGE. The children were crossing the road in a group when the HGV hit them Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Moment lorry ploughs in into school children, killing three Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Three schoolchildren have been killed and two others seriously injured after a lorry ploughed into them as they were crossing the road near their school gates. 
The youngsters were crossing the road in a group when the lorry rammed into them in the horrific incident which happened in Guiping city in South China's Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region. 
Emergency services raced to the scene but one child was pronounced dead at the scene. 
Four others were rushed to a nearby hospital by paramedics but two passed away after failing to respond to emergency treatment. The kids were crossing the road close to their school gates (Photo: AsiaWire) 
The two remaining children are still in hospital suffering injuries, but medics have confirmed they are not believed to be life threatening. 
CCTV shows the students being guided by the teachers at the crossing after school. 
One teacher places two traffic cones to stop oncoming cars but the oncoming lorry did not break in time. The lorry tries to brake as it heads towards the kids (Photo: AsiaWire) Three schoolchildren are reported to have been killed in the collision (Photo: AsiaWire) Read More 
The heavy lorry can be seen swerving as it crashed into the kids. 
Police say the driver, a man they have only identified by the surname Liang, has been arrested. 
He remains in custody while investigations are ongoing. Like us on Facebook
